attributes.action: Stop Cutting The United Kingdoms Armed Forces Budget
attributes.additional_details:
Stop cutting the amount of money that our armed forces are reciving. Our forces won't be able to continue there roles in other countrys, also it will put people's lifes at risk. Instead of cutting the armed forces budget, cut other spending including forgine aid, benifits and investments in other countrys including China.

The decommisioning of HMS Ark Royal and the Harrier fleet has reduced the Royal Navy's air capability. In Libya, HMS Ark Royal and the Harrier fleet would of proved vital and effective, also in the gulf against the pirates, this would of proved effective to stop them.

Also serving British Army personal in Afghanistan have been notifed that they are at risk of loosing there jobs once they return from tour, that is un-accseptible, how can you tell sombody that the country there fighting for, might get rid of them once they have done there duty.

Support Our British Forces, Secure A Safer Future
